page.title: 03 Recreation.
page.content: {Squash Club.} I am a member of Prestbury Squash Club.It is Â£6.70 to join.You have to pay 80.pence for lights for one hour.There are 4 courts and a bar.The season is from September to March and there are lots of competitions to enter.I play in the Prestbury team.In the league we travel all round the North West. {Guides.} There are three packs of Prestbury Guides.I go to 1st.Prestbury on a Tuesday. I am a patrol leader and my patrol is called White Rose. Our pack has a grey tie,2nd.Prestbury have a red tie and 3rd.Prestbury have a green tie. I enjoy Guides a lot because you learn new things,meet new friends and enjoy yourself.
